1.title: Chillingham Castle

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: The team investigates Chillingham Castle's bloody history.

2.title: The Leopard Inn

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The team travel to Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire where Sharon, landlady of the historic Leopard Inn located in the "mother town of the Potteries" Burslem, has seen shadowy figures and been attacked by unseen forces.

3.title: De Grey St.

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Sandy, Barri and Chris explore a suburban house in Hull, where the owner is too scared to stay in his own home due to troubled spirits and terrifying portals.

4.title: The Queens Oak

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: At the Queens Oak pub in picturesque Finchampstead, malevolent spirits are threatening the new owners, leaving them with no option but to ask the intrepid team for help.

5.title: The Batehall

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: The team of investigators travel to Macclesfield, Cheshire to explore this 15th century coaching inn that is believed to be haunted by a small boy and a mysterious grey lady.

6.title: Fleur De Lys

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Sandy, Barri and Chris investigate the oldest pub in the New Forest, the Fleur De Lys in the village of Pilley and discover some shocking premonitions.

7.title: Great Fulford

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Sandy, Barri and Chris explore a country estate in Devon with a dark history, from a battlefield in the grounds to the spirit of a tormented child. They also meet Great Fulford's notorious owner Francis Fulford.

8.title: Fyvie Castle

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Sandy, Barri and Chris explore a Scottish castle that is reputed to be plagued by an evil curse and by the soul of a restless woman, with stories of skeletal remains and blood-soaked floors there should be plenty to investigate.

9.title: The Dolphin

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Sandy, Barri and Chris lock down for the night at The Dolphin, an 18th century pub in Littlehampton with a sinister history. But events take an unexpected turn.

10.title: The Skirrid Inn

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Chris Fleming, Barri Ghai and Sandy Lakdar visit one of the oldest pubs in Wales. The first floor of the Inn is reputed to have been used as a court and criminals sentenced to death hung in the stairwell.

11.title: Balgonie Castle

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Sandy Lakdar, Barri Ghai and Chris Fleming explore a Scottish castle with a history of murder, torture and war, which is supposedly haunted by a mysterious green lady.

12.title: The Cage

episode of.title: Help! My House Is Haunted (TV Series 2018– )

imdb.plot outline: Created by Ghost Adventures' Zak Bagans, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series that leaves no stone unturned when it comes to searching for paranormal entities. Where does the average family turn when their own house starts showing signs of unexplained supernatural phenomena? Ghostly bumps in the night make for good cinema, but if it's happening in your own house and scaring the life out of mum, dad and the kids, then it's suddenly not so entertaining. The Help My House Is Haunted team of new, fresh of paranormal investigators are taking the art of ghost-hunting into the 21st century. Chris Fleming from the US, Barri Ghai from the UK and Sandy Lakdar from France get to work across the continent.
imdb.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
akas: Help! My House Is Haunted (United Kingdom)
plot: A team of paranormal experts travel the UK looking into instances of paranormal activity in the homes of ordinary people.

Created by Ghost Adventures' Zak Bagans, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series that leaves no stone unturned when it comes to searching for paranormal entities. Where does the average family turn when their own house starts showing signs of unexplained supernatural phenomena? Ghostly bumps in the night make for good cinema, but if it's happening in your own house and scaring the life out of mum, dad and the kids, then it's suddenly not so entertaining. The Help My House Is Haunted team of new, fresh of paranormal investigators are taking the art of ghost-hunting into the 21st century. Chris Fleming from the US, Barri Ghai from the UK and Sandy Lakdar from France get to work across the continent.
